author: WSJ Staff
title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Tech Stocks, Wells Fargo 401(k) Probe, Permanent Vacation - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Investors rattled by recent volatility are becoming choosier about which technology-focused stocks they scoop up, a reversal from 2017 that threatens to undermine the tech sectorâ€™s dominance, writes Ben Eisen and Akane Otani. The S&P 500 tech sector, up 1.8% in 2018, is still among the best-performing groups in the broader index.
